column4: halo anyone got ati radeon 8500 to 9500 running on Dapper????

nm. I have 9600
but it's working.
3d acceleration with fglrx drivers...works?

maybe you have ati open source driver which works fine for me on debian sarge...you will see which driver you have if you type glxinfo in konzole
one sec.
after you type glxinfo and you see any Mesa driver you will know you have ati open source driver which is fine but supposed to be slower than fglrx and can be problem with cedega and GLX desktop
...mhm XGL desktop sorry

any word Mesa on the driver section
hmmm.. *cratching his head* I think using some ubuntu guide in the wiki
glxinfo | grep Mesa returned nothing.
so you have probably the right driver it would say radeon 9600 on fglrxinfo
and you remeber how you installed the fglrx drivers?
says 9700. now that I think about it, it should be 9700.
sorry to miss inform.
do you remeber how you installed the fglrx drivers?
I think you add some mutliverse to the repos and apt-get something.
